name: <path::PathBuf as core::convert::From<alloc_crate::boxed::Box<path::Path>>>::from

path::Path::into_path_buf.doc:
Converts a [`Box<Path>`](Box) into a [`PathBuf`] without copying or

doc: Converts a [Box]<[Path]> into a [`PathBuf`]. This conversion does not allocate or copy memory.
